title: 2018 import ICE

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
`use fuchsia_async::{self as fasync};`

```   Compiling bt_gap v0.1.0 (file:///usr/local/google/home/bwb/fuchsia/garnet/bin/bluetooth/bt-gap)                                  
error: internal compiler error: librustc/hir/def.rs:263: attempted .def_id() on invalid def: Err

thread 'main' panicked at 'Box<Any>', librustc_errors/lib.rs:580:9
```
